answers.answer: omg trust me you're not alone. I'm a Ftm so I can't tell you why, but I'm always thirsty and have cloudy urine. We'll just blame it on mommy hood :)
Haha yes. How far along are you? I'm 6 weeks today!

I have been super thirsty since week 4 even though i am drinking lits of water. I am peeing more often as well. My doctor says this is all normal. My urine color is different but that is directly related to my prenatal vitamins.

I've heard being really thirsty can be related to gestational diabetes. I'm not heavy but I do have a couple extra pounds and I did want to lose a few pounds before becoming pregnant just because I was kinda worried about that. I'm gonna try not to worry about it tho since I'm reading to more normal than anything to be thirsty.

I drink water like it's going out of style, my dreams revolve around water. And I'm constantly thirsty. I love water. I think it's normal.
I get hot flashes too..like I'll randomly get hot..then cool down ..on and off. It's worse when I wake up I'm like burning up and it's absolutely horrible

question: All I do is drink water!!! Constantly feeling the need to drink more more and more. Is this normal? Also, like before I was pregnant if I drank a lot of water my urine would be clear pretty much. But even with all the water I'm drinking now that I'm pregnant, it's yellow, sometimes cloudy. It's sometimes a dull yellow too. I have no pain like in my back where my kidneys are or anything..idk it just seems strange. Any one hear of this or experience it themselves? I don't have an appointment until March 9th and I've read online it could be something with my liver but yoy can't always believe stuff online. I'd feel really silly calling and asking about this...
title: so thirsty!!
